name: PHP_Task_Runner
description: Task runner to optimise PHP sites. ############################### Compress images, compress and combine SVG's into one sprite, minify css and js, concatenate js and css, autoprefix css. ############################### HTML, JS, PHP and SCSS linting and compiling by Adobe Brackets. ############################### PHP output minified by HTML Minify plugin https://github.com/cferdinandi/gmt-html-minify.git.  ############################### Concat and minify plugins and parent theme js with minqueue plugin. ############################### Includes watch and browsersync for dev. ############################### IMPORTANT - For image compression all images must be in the 'uploads' folder only. ###############################

scripts.server-sync: browser-sync start --proxy http://cheapSign.development --files "/*.php, includes/components/*.php, includes/content/*.php, includes/modals/*.php, assets/scripts/*.js, assets/php/*.php, assets/scss/*.css, assets/images, !node_modules"
scripts.minify-icons: svgo -f assets/images/icons/svg -o assets/images/icons/svg && svg-sprite-generate -d assets/images/icons -o assets/images/icons/sprite.svg
scripts.compress-images: npm run minify-images && npm run minify-icons
scripts.watch:images: onchange "assets/images" -- npm run build:images && onchange "../../uploads" -- npm run build:images

author: Jamie Polson-Brown
